sub_title: Marketing and Communications Enthusiast with specialisation in Luxury Fashion and Lifestyle, Relocated to Utrecht, Netherlands
summary: Experienced Marketing Manager with 8 years of work experience in Luxury, Fashion/Lifestyle and Retail segments with exposure to India and working for brands from Singapore, USA and Poland. I am a strong marketing professional skilled in Retail (ATL & BTL), Digital Marketing, Public Relations & Communications, Trend Analysis, Events, Customer Relations Management (CRM), Brand Building, Corporate Identity, Media Planning and Negotiations. Backed by a creative and fashion communication education, have interacted, managed and lead both creative as well as retail marketing teams to fulfill short-term and long-term objectives. My professional experience thus far has gained me a variety of exposure in the premium goods, communication and marketing segment combined with my multi-cultural exposure.
